Articles.Content:
so I was able to get to the title screen, however a window popped up saying that Tweakscale had 4 fatal errors occur. Is there a way to fix these other than removing the offending mods?

here is my KSP.log and output_log.txt: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1X1V_zFfuub__t6CtzaKxUAxuppP8ceC1?usp=sharing

Hi. I would had answered sooner if you had posted it on TweakScale Thread.  

I have a workaround for these parts on this post:

 

You can also download the fixed patches direct from the repository, and overwrite the current ones:

https://github.com/net-lisias-ksp/TweakScale/blob/dev/emergencial/2.4.3.1/GameData/TweakScale/patches/B9_Aerospace/B9_HX.cfg

https://github.com/net-lisias-ksp/TweakScale/blob/dev/emergencial/2.4.3.1/GameData/TweakScale/patches/MarkIVSystem_TweakScale.cfg

(click on 'Raw" and then save to your harddrive).

These files are to go to the next TweakScale revision, 2.4.3.1, that will be issued in the near future.
Just to inform you that TweakScale 2.4.3.1 has a fix for this.
